title: Not Super Robot Wars at All - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Harem   Mecha   Romance   Sci-fi   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Angels   Complex Family Relationships   Cosmic Wars   Early Romance   Fanfiction   Fleet Battles   Futuristic Setting   Male Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Parent Complex   Polygamy   Scientists   Transported to Another World
author: Ye Xian   也闲
description:
Since his transmigration, he has studied hard and entered Anaheim to design Gundam, do scientific research, study driving and the way of self-marketing. He could be called a great man among time travellers. Until one day, “that” appeared in front of him…

“Idiot, are robots all Gundams?!”>
